synopsis.text: Peace has returned to the demon realm, but sinister forces plot against Demon King Anos Voldigoad. Rumors spread of a powerful "Child of God" who seeks to destroy Anos. To uncover the truth, Anos must journey into the mysterious spirit world, undergoing difficult trials. With unmatched power and confidence, Anos readies to battle formidable foes to protect his realm. Though they boast grand titles, none can rival the true Demon King of Tyranny. Anos would prefer to live as a misfit at Demon King Academy. However, threats emerge from the shadows, forcing the peaceful era's mightiest hero to take up arms once more. Backed by steadfast allies, Anos heads into the unknown to confront this menacing new adversary. While once merciless, he now understands restraint. But if provoked, his tyrannical wrath remains undimmed by time's passage. Anos again overcomes all odds in an epic struggle between demon kings and deities.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
